name: Bestow Planar Infusion III
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Planar Adventures © 2018, Paizo Inc.
text: This functions as bestow planar infusion I, except that the touched creature gains the greater infusion of the current plane.
text_zh: 这种法术如同位面注能I（Bestow Planar Infusion I），除了接触的生物获得当前所处位面的高等注能效果。
